XXkathinau:5: yaḥ śrīmān sasurāsurair aviratam pādāravindārcitaḥ sākṣāt puṇyanidhānamaṅgalaguruś cintāmaṇiḥ sarvavit /
XXkathinau:6: niḥśeṣoddhṛtadoṣajālajaṭilaḥ śauddhodaniḥ pāragaḥ pāyād vo bhagavān munīśvarajino dedīpyamānadyutiḥ
XXkathinau:9: athāyuṣmān mahākāśyapo jānann eva parārthaṃ bhagavantam evam āha /
XXkathinau:12: kārttikakṛṣṇapratipadam ārabhya triṃśad divaseṣu yad ahorātraṃ tatra saṃghasya kaṭhinam utpadyate
XXkathinau:15: kṛtakalpadaśārañjanā nīlasūtrasūcīśāstrakalpena tad dānapatayaḥ saṃnipatite saṃghe niḥsārāpayitavyāḥ
XXkathinau:16: karmakārakeṇa bhikṣuṇā tato dānapatayo dānaparikarmakathayā pratisaṃmodayitavyāḥ /
XXkathinau:19: kaṭhinapradānaṃ kartukāmena dānapatinā 'ṣāḍhe śrāvaṇe vā māse savinayam upagamya kalpikakārakasya mukhenāryasaṃghasya vijñaptiḥ karaṇīyā tena caivaṃ karaṇīyā /
XXkathinau:21: yadite 'ṅgīkaroty āryasaṃgho no cen nivārayatv iti /
XXkathinau:22: so pi tadā yadi dānapater āśayo viśuddhaḥ suviśuddhaṃ ca deyavastu syāt tadā tūṣṇībhāvena svīkuryān no cen nivārayet /
XXkathinau:23: yadi tadādhivāsayaty āryasaṃghas tadā supramāṇāṃ surūpāṃ yugalīṃ rañjayitvā 'sya darśayet
XXkathinau:24: tataḥ kalpikakārakas tām ādāya dānapatiṃ visṛjya hastena māpayitvānayā kaṭhinacīvaraṃ kariṣyati
XXkathinau:26: dvividhaṃ hi kaṭhinaṃ cīvaraṃ kṛtam akṛtakaṃ ca /
XXkathinau:27: tatra nikāyabhedena trikhaṇḍapañcakhaṇḍādikaṃ pariṇāhenānyūna trihastam āyāmenānyūna pañcahastaṃ susīvitaṃ kṛtakaṃ /
XXkathinau:29: tat punaḥ pratyekaṃ dvividhaṃ niṣṭhitam aniṣṭḥitaṃ ca /
XXkathinau:33: siddhaṃ kaṭhinacīvaram ādāyādhiṣṭhita traimāsasyāryasaṃghasya purastād evaṃ vadet
XXkathinau:34: / samanvāharāryyānena cīvareṇāsmiṃ saṃghāvāse 'mūkanāmā dānapatiḥ kaṭhinam āstariṣyati
XXkathinau:36: evaṃ dvir api trir api tad anv āryasaṃgho pi tad adhyeṣaṇām aṅgīkṛtya divā[.. ..
XXkathinau:37: ..]vā masīdravādinā nīlarāgarasena vā prānte catur bindūṃś catusatyādi viśuddhyā datvā trin vā triratnādi viśuddhyā dvau vā yogasaṃbhārādi viśuddhyā yathā vidhānam adhi(nu?)[..]yed etat prabhātāyān tu nisāyāṃ parikalpitesūpasṛṣṭe samucchritātapatradhvajapatākā digvidig vinyastakhaṇḍapiṇḍadhūpaghaṭikojjvalayaṣṭipradīpasugandhagandhādidivyasurabhikusumāvakīrṇe pradeśe khaṭvāyām mañcāyām vā pṛthupīṭhake mantrādhiṣṭhitaṃ pañcabhir upahārair abhyarcitaṃ kaṭhinacīvaraṃ prasārya pratiṣṭhāpayet /
XXkathinau:38: tad anu tac chrāddho dānapatir udārābhiḥ pūjābhir abhipūjyābhipraṇamya suvarṇarajatatāmrādidhātu dravyaṃ marakatapadmarāgavajravaidūryyendranīlādikaṃ ratnaṃ divyāmbarābharaṇādikaṃ
XXkathinau:39: ca tasmin kaṭhinacīvare ratnatrayāya dadyāt // kṣetraṃ vādikā gṛhārāmopavanādikaṃ dāsīdāsahastyaś ca gomahiṣyādikaṃ piṇḍakādipratyāyaṃ ca bahirdhanantāḍapatrādau tan nāmākam vilikhya tatraiva prayacchet /
XXkathinau:40: bhakṣyabhojyalehyapeyādikaṃ bhājanādīni pañcopakaraṇabhāṇḍāni śayanāsanādīni bhaiṣajyāny upakaraṇāni cānekāny upabhogārhāṇi vastūni kaṭhinaṃ saṃspṛśya tat pārśvataḥ saṃghopabhogāya viśrāṇayet iti kaṭhinaṃ /
XXkathinau:42: athāyuṣmān sumanā nāma bhikṣur bhagavantam etad avocat // bhagavan kena kāraṇena cīvarādikaṃ kaṭhinam ity ucyate /
XXkathinau:44: āyuṣman dṛḍhaṃ viśuddham abhedyaṃ vipulāvināśi ca kaṭhinam ity ucyate /
XXkathinau:45: tathā hi dānapater āśayasya dṛḍhatvāc cīvarasya viśuddhatvāt saṃghasyābhedyatvād dānasya phalasya ca vipulāvināśitvāc ca sarvam eva kaṭhinaṃ bhavati //
XXkathinau:48: śāntendriyaś cāpy upaśāntamānaso nimantrayāmāsa jinaḥ svaśiṣyān //
XXkathinau:50: śrāvastyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme śubhe surabhidhūpadhūpite sugandhipuṣpaprakaropaśobhite śuciparisare mahārham mahadāsana-m-āsīnaṃ viśuddhabodhiṃ vidhvastasamastadḥsaṃ mahākāruṇikaṃ
XXkathinau:51: bhagavantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ śākyamunīndraṃ mahatpariṣadgaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ viharati sma /
XXkathinau:52: atha bhagavān tūṣṇībhāvenāvasthitaḥ san sattvārthaṃ prati daśavidhabuddhakṛtyakaraṇāya laukikaṃ cittam etc., v. . 22
XXkathinau:53: tataḥ tīrthikaparivrājakacoditāyās tathāgataṃ prati duṣkṛtaṃ karma saṃsmṛtya saṃjātasaṃvegāḥ sthavirasthāvirā bhikṣavaḥ śirasi vinihitāñjalayo mahadāsanāsīnaṃ mahākāruṇikaṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ praṇipatyedam abrūvan /
XXkathinau:54: kṛtā bhagavatānekā dharmādhikārikī kathā vyākṛtāś cāneke sattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
XXkathinau:55: tad anv anavatapte bhagavatḥ purastāt svakasvakāṃ karmaplotiṃ vyākurmaḥ /
XXkathinau:56: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ jīvatāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyamāṇānāṃ yāpayatām daśāvaśyakaraṇīyāni bhavanti // katamāni daśa /
XXkathinau:59: yāvad anekena sattvenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ notpāditaṃ bhavati /
XXkathinau:60: yāvan na sarve vineyā vinītā bhavanti /
XXkathinau:61: yāvac chrāvakayugam agratāyāṃ na nirdiṣṭaṃ bhavati /
XXkathinau:63: yāvan nāyuṣaḥ pañcamo bhāga utsṛṣṭo bhavati /
XXkathinau:64: yāvan na śrāvastyām mahānagaryāṃ mahāprātihāryaṃ darśitaṃ bhavati /
XXkathinau:65: yāvan na śāṃkāśye nagare devāvatāram darśitaṃ bhavati /
XXkathinau:66: yāvan na mātāpitarau satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitau bhavataḥ /
XXkathinau:67: yāvad anavatapte mahāsarasi pūrvikā karmaplotiḥ śrāvakasaṅghena sārdhaṃ na vyākṛtā bhavatīti
XXkathinau:68: atha bhagavatā manasi kṛtvā śrāvakasaṃghena sārdhaṃ vyākṛtā bhavatīti /
XXkathinau:69: bhagavan pūrvikāṃ karmaplotim anavatapte vyākartukāmo bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma /
XXkathinau:70: śrutvā tad uktaṃ vacanaṃ maharṣer ājñāṃ gṛhītvā sugatasya śiṣyāḥ /
XXkathinau:71: ṛddhyā tatas te yayur agrapudgalā haṃsādhipaṃ vyomni yathaiva haṃsāḥ //
XXkathinau:73: visphuradvicitramarīcijāla ekonaiḥ pañcabhir arhacchataiḥ sārdhaṃ lohitapakṣaiḥ pakṣibhiḥ parivṛto guratmān iva vihāyasā jetavanād vihārān niragāt /
XXkathinau:75: atha bhagavān mahāśrāvakasaṃghena saha śrāvastyām antarhitaḥ himavaduttarasthagandhamādanaparvatasyottareṇa mahākīṭaparvatasyāgre 'navatapte mahāsarasi pratyasthāt /
XXkathinau:81: yaṃ vyāḍayakṣācaritaṃ manoramaṃ vicitrapuṣpais tarubhiḥ suśobhitam /
XXkathinau:82: ito yato jalavahasāgaraṅgamā nadyaś catasraḥ prasṛtāś caturdiśam //
XXkathinau:83: gaṅgā ca sindhuś ca nadaś ca vakṣuḥ śītā ca yān naiva taranti martyāḥ /
XXkathinau:84: anyatra yo (!) ṛddhibalasya lābhī hanteha gacchāmi saro mahodadhim //
XXkathinau:91: atha tatra buddho bhagavāṃl laukikaṃ cittam utpādayati /
XXkathinau:92: tadāntaśaḥ kuntapipīlikādayo bhagavataś cetasā cittam ājānate /
XXkathinau:93: atha nandopanandau nāgarājāv evaṃ saṃlakṣayataḥ kiṃkāraṇaṃ bhagavatedaṃ cittam utpāditam anavatapte mahāsarasi karmaplotikāṃ vyākartukāma iti buddhādhiṣṭhānena jñātvā tābhyām anavatapte mahāsarasi madhye śakaṭacakrapramāṇaṃ sahasradalaṃ vilasanmaṇinālakaṃ suhīrakesaram pañcaratnamayaṃ bhagavata āsanārthaṃ sauvarṇasaroruhaṃ vinirmitaṃ tatra bhagavān niṣasāda bhikṣavo 'pi bhagavato 'bhisaṃmukham anyāsu kamalakarṇikāsu niṣaṇṇāḥ
XXkathinau:94: tena khalu punaḥ samayenāyuṣmāñ śāriputro gṛdhrakūṭe parvate saṃghāṭīṃ sivāyamānas tiṣṭhati
XXkathinau:95: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam āmantrayate sma /
XXkathinau:97: evam bhagavann ity āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavato vacanam pratiśrutyānavatapte mahāsarasy antarhitaḥ /
XXkathinau:98: gṛdhrakūṭe parvate pratyasthād āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya purastād evaṃ cāha /
XXkathinau:99: he śāriputra śāstā ta ekonaiḥ pañcabhir arhacchataiḥ sārdham anavatapte mahāsarasi pūrvikāṃ karmaplotiṃ vyākartukāmas tvām udīkṣaṇaparas tiṣṭhati /
XXkathinau:102: āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana saṃghāṭīṃ tāvat sīvyāmi paścād āgamiṣyāmi /
XXkathinau:103: tato maudgalyāyanena tad vacanam amṛṣyamāṇena rddhyā pañcāṅgulayo 'sya nibaddhāḥ /
XXkathinau:105: / āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana yady evaṃ saṃghāṭīsūtrā bhavatu /
XXkathinau:107: āyuṣmañ chāriputra yadi na yāsyasi saṃghāṭī tāvat sīvayitavyaḥ /
XXkathinau:112: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ svarddhyā pañcabhir aṅgulibhiḥ sīvayitum ārabhaḥ /
XXkathinau:114: āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana yady evam anyasūtrā bhavatu /
XXkathinau:116: āyuṣmañ śāriputraivaṃ kṛtvā yadi na yāsyasi /
XXkathinau:119: tvaṃ hy āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana bhagavata rddhimatāṃ madhye 'gro nirdiṣṭaḥ /
XXkathinau:120: idaṃ tāvat prāg eva māṃ balena nayiṣyasi /
XXkathinau:128: āyuṣmāñ śāriputraḥ saṃlakṣayati gṛdhrakūṭaparvatam apy ayam ākarṣayiṣyati /
XXkathinau:133: yadā saṃkṣubdhā bhavanti tadā bhikṣavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ paripṛcchanti /
XXkathinau:138: api ca mahāśrāvakayor anyonyaṃ mahad ṛddhiprakurvitaṃ /
XXkathinau:141: tena yasyāṃ padmakarṇikāyāṃ bhagavān niṣaṇṇas tasyāṃ padmanāla upanibaddhaḥ /
XXkathinau:147: āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyanaiko 'ham apy āgacchāmi yāvad āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano na gacchati
XXkathinau:148: tadāyuṣmāñ śāriputraḥ prathamataraṃ gatvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivanditvā svāsanapadmakarṇikāyāṃ niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXkathinau:149: tataḥ paścād āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyana āgataḥ svāsane ca vyavasthitaḥ /
XXkathinau:154: tataḥ sarve bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ paripṛcchanti /
XXkathinau:155: paśya bhadanta bhagavatāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano maharddhiko mahānubhāva ṛddhimatām madhye 'gro nirdiṣṭaḥ /
XXkathinau:159: na bhikṣava etarhy eva yathātīte 'py adhvany anena śilpenāpi parājitaḥ /
XXkathinau:162: / sa kenacit karaṇīyena yavanaviṣayaṃ gato yantrakarācāryasya niveśane
XXkathinau:165: sā ca dāruyantrapuṭṭalikā tailodvartanaṃ haste nidhāya sthāpayitā /
XXkathinau:169: sa saṃlakṣayati nūnaṃ mama copasthānāya paricārikā preṣitā bhaviṣyatīti /
XXkathinau:173: dhig aho tasya janma jambudvīpe manuṣyasya yasyedṛśī yuvatī rūpayauvanasampannā paramaramaṇīyā cakṣuṣā vā hastena vā śārīrasparśenādikaṃ [sic] na bhaved ity anenāmṛtasadṛśena mādhuryavacanena sambhāvitaḥ samāhartum ārabdhavān /
XXkathinau:175: tathāpi sā dāruyantrapuṭṭalikā na kiṃcid uktety avadhārya kāmopasaktacetasā satvaram upagamya
XXkathinau:176: sā tena hastena gṛhītvākarṣitā tadā dārusaṃkalikānāṃ puñjo vyavasthitaḥ /
XXkathinau:181: yathāsau sarājikāyāṃ parṣanmadhye pratibhedopahāsaṃ gamiṣyatīti cintayitvā tena dvārābhimukha ātmodbaddhakaṇṭhakaś citritaḥ /
XXkathinau:195: yasya kasyacin niveśane 'tithiḥ kālaṃ lokāntaraṃ karoti /
XXkathinau:196: tasya tāvat saṃskāro yāvad rājña āveditaṃ bhavati /
XXkathinau:198: deva madhyadeśāc citrakarācārya ihāgataḥ sa ca mama niveśāne 'vatīrṇas tasya mayā dāruyantrapuṭṭalikāṃ kṛtvā paricārikā preṣitā /
XXkathinau:199: sā tena hastena gṛhītvākarṣitā tadā dārusaṃkalikānāṃ puñjo vyavasthitaḥ /
XXkathinau:201: taṃ deva pratyavekṣayatu paścād ahaṃ saṃskāraṃ kariṣyāmi /
XXkathinau:208: tena kuṭhāraṃ gṛhītvā pāśaṃ chettum ārabdhaṃ /
XXkathinau:209: yāvac chinnaḥ sa yantrakarācāryaḥ pratibhinnako vyayasthitaḥ /
XXkathinau:212: tvaṃ punar mayā sarājikāyāṃ parṣanmadhye pratibhedita iti /
XXkathinau:214: yo 'sau citrakarācārya eṣa evāsau śāriputro bhikṣuḥ /
XXkathinau:226: tato vivādād anyonyaṃ rājñaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntāv upasaṃkramya rājñaḥ sakāśe kathayato 'haṃ śobhanaṃ śilpaṃ jānāmi /
XXkathinau:230: bhavantau nāhaṃ jāne yo yuṣmākaṃ śilpaṃ jānīte /
XXkathinau:231: api tv eka ekāṃ bhitthiṃ parimārjayatu /
XXkathinau:232: dvitīyo 'py aparām evaṃ tau madhye yamanikāṃ datvā
XXkathinau:236: yena citrakarma kṛtaṃ sa rājñaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXkathinau:246: rājā tad dṛṣṭvā kathayati svacchataram idaṃ citrakarmeti /
XXkathinau:257: eṣa evāsau mahāmaudgalyāyano bhikṣus tadāpy eṣa śilpena parājita iti /
XXkathinau:258: etarhy apy anena rddhyā parājita iti /
XXkathinau:263: kadācid atha śaṅkhena padbhyāṃ apṛṣṭo jaṭaḥ krudhā /
XXkathinau:264: likhitaḥ prāha taṃ mūrdhabhedaḥ sūryoyade 'stu te //
XXkathinau:266: ity ukte tena suciraṃ sāndhakāram abhūj jagat //
XXkathinau:270: likhitaḥ śāriputro 'yaṃ tad vijetā tadāpy abhūt //
XXkathinau:271: etarhy apy anena rddhyā parājita ityādi vistarato jñeyaṃ /
XXkathinau:272: yāsāṃ dhyānasamāpattīnāṃ lābhī tathāgatas tāsāṃ pratyekabuddhā nāmāpi na jānate /
XXkathinau:273: yāsāṃ pratyekabuddhā lābhinas tāsāṃ śāriputro nāmāpi na jānīte /
XXkathinau:274: yāsāṃ lābhī śāriputras tāsāṃ maudgalyāyano nāmāpi na jānīte /
XXkathinau:275: yāsāṃ lābhī maudgalyāyanas tāsāṃ tadanye śrāvakā nāmāpi na jānate /
XXkathinau:278: bahulavihāriṇāṃ saṃdhāya maya rddhimatām agrata iti nirdiṣṭaḥ /
XXkathinau:280: sa tatra gatvā giram abhyudāharet pūrvaṃnivāsācaritānulomikām /
XXkathinau:281: ākhyātu yo 'nusmaratīha tatra śubhāśubhaṃ karmasukhodayaṃ saḥ //
XXkathinau:282: atha sthavirasthavirā bhikṣavas tathāgatājñayā svakasvakaṃ karmaplotikaṃ vyākurvanti /
XXkathinau:284: nāgilo nāma nāmena bhikṣur buddhasya śrāvakaḥ /
XXkathinau:285: praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākārṣīd anavatapte mahāhrade sarasi //
XXkathinau:286: tato nāgilo nāma bhikṣus tathāgatasyāgrato daśanakhāñjaliṃ kṛtvā svakāṃ karmaplotikāṃ vyārocayati sma /
XXkathinau:290: catuḥṣaṣṭiṃ tu vārāṇi devendratvaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā // 2
XXkathinau:292: prādeśikānāṃ rājñāṃ tu saṃkhyā mama na vidyate // 3
XXkathinau:293: aho ratnatraye kārāṃ kurvanti yatra mānavāḥ /
XXkathinau:294: parīttamātraṃ dattvā tu labhante vipulaṃ phalam // 4
XXkathinau:295: yadi martyeṣu me janma hitvā divyaṃ sukhaṃ mahat /
XXkathinau:297: yadi devopapattiḥ syāt tyaktvā mānuṣyakaṃ sukham /
XXkathinau:298: devasaṃghasya pūjyo ' smi kaṭhinadānasya tat phalam // 6
XXkathinau:301: punar api kaṭhinadānasyotkarṣaṃ kathayann āha padotkṣepe padotkṣepe dūṣyāḥ prādurbhavanti me /
XXkathinau:302: dūṣyopari ca tiṣṭhāmi dūṣyaṃ cāpi vitānakam // 8
XXkathinau:303: bhavā udghāṭitā mahyaṃ kleśāś cādhyāsitā mayā /
XXkathinau:306: ṣaḍ abhijñā hy anuprāptāḥ kṛtaṃ buddhasya śāsanam // 10
XXkathinau:308: pravāti dikṣu śuciśīlagandho gandhapradānāt khalu mokṣayāyī // gandha
XXkathinau:309: puṣpaṃ ye sugatasya saṃghasamitau dāsyanti śraddhānvitāḥ puṣpānīva vibhānti sarvajagatāṃ svargānugā mokṣiṇaḥ /
XXkathinau:310: pūjyante sasurāsurair avirataṃ sacchīlagandhānvitāḥ kāyād gandhavaraṃ prayāti sukhino ghrāṇendriyaṃ śudhyati //
XXkathinau:313: ye dhūpaṃ pradadanti manmatharipoḥ saṃghāya sadbhāvatas te nityaṃ sukham āpnuvanti sukhitā bhogeśvarāḥ śīlinaḥ /
XXkathinau:314: na bhrāntasmṛtayo bhavanti vaśino dhyāneṣu labdhāspadāḥ śāntiṃ yānti manoharāḥ paṭudhiyaḥ pūjyāḥ sadevāsuraiḥ // dhūpa
XXkathinau:316: nārīnarāṇām abhivīkṣaṇīyo yo dīpamālāṃ prakaroti saṃghe // dīpa
XXkathinau:318: tailapradānena bhavanti martyāḥ surūparūpāḥ sukham āpnuvanti // taila
XXkathinau:319: upānahaṃ hṛṣṭamanāḥ pradātā ṛddheḥ sa lābhī bhavitā dhanāḍhyaḥ /
XXkathinau:321: jātena tena muninā prathamaṃ pṛthivyāṃ prakrāmatā balavataiva padāni satpa /
XXkathinau:322: padmāvalī viracitā phalam eva cābhūt sā pādukāyugaladānam ṛte kutaḥ syāt // upānaha
XXkathinau:323: chattrībhūto bhavati jagatām ātapatrapradānāc chāyāramye vasati suciraṃ līlayā rājalakṣmyā
XXkathinau:324: dharmasvāmī bhavati niyataṃ sarvalokasya nātho nāsau gacchet kugatigahanaṃ rūpavān bhogalābhī
XXkathinau:325: āropya hṛṣṭaḥ prathamaṃ mahātmā chattraṃ purā kāśyapadhātugarbhe /
XXkathinau:326: divi kṣitau cāpy upasevya saukhyaṃ nando mahātmā praśamaṃ jagāma // chattra
XXkathinau:327: prajñālābhī bhavati niyataṃ sūtrasūcīpradānāt prajñālābhād bhavagatibhayān mucyate dhīnidhānaḥ
XXkathinau:328: prajñā rājñī duritaharaṇe nāsti kācit tayānyā sā saṃpannā bhavati saphala saṃpadā sarvathaiva // sūtrasūcī
XXkathinau:330: khaṭikāṃ yo dadātiha jāyate paṇḍito mahān // khaṭikā
XXkathinau:334: śleṣmāmayakrimivivarjitacārugaṇḍas tāmbūladānavihitaṃ phalam etad agram // 2 // tāmbūla
XXkathinau:336: gātrasya bhūṣaṇavidher divi vā kṣitau vā śreṣṭhaṃ vibhūṣaṇam ataḥ pravadanti vastram // 1
XXkathinau:340: na bhrājate hi bhuvi vastram ṛte manuṣyaḥ // 2
XXkathinau:341: tasmād vibhūṣaṇam atulyam avekṣyavastraṃ śītoṣṇadaṃśamaśakaprativāraṇaṃ ca
XXkathinau:342: hrīvastram apratisamaṃ samavāptakāmair vastrapradānam asakṛn manujaiḥ pradeyam // 3
XXkathinau:345: śrīcakravartir api vastram ṛte na bhāti // 4
XXkathinau:347: kailāsameruśikhare surasaṃghamadhye brahmendrarudra api vastravinā na bhāti // 5
XXkathinau:348: dattvā satpiṅgacitrāṃ stabakaviracitāṃ nīlapītāvadātai raktaiś cānyaiś ca ramyaiḥ suruciravasanaiś cīvaraiś cārumālām /
XXkathinau:349: divyaṃ vāmuktavastraṃ sugatasutagaṇāyābhirūpo manojño hrīvastrālaṅkṛtātmā bhavati paṭumatiḥ sarvadharmeśvaraḥ saḥ // vastra
XXkathinau:351: caranti martyāḥ sugatasya śiṣye pradāya citrāṇi vibhūṣaṇāni // ābharaṇa
XXkathinau:352: nāgnir viṣaṃ krāmati tasya dehaṃ na cāpi śastraṃ na tu vajravarṣam /
XXkathinau:353: tāmrādidānena jinasya saṃghe maitrīvihārī prakaroti martyaḥ // tāmrādibhājana
XXkathinau:354: pūjyo vandyo bhavati manujo yatra yatropapannaḥ svargāvāpto vipuladhanavān saṃmataḥ satsabhāsu
XXkathinau:355: uccairdīpte sumahati kule jāyate bhogaśīlaḥ śāntiṃ yāyān nirupamaguṇaḥ saṃpradātāsanasya //
XXkathinau:357: saṃghasya bhojanaṃ dattvā sarvatra sukham edhate // bhojana
XXkathinau:358: jāto bhaved uccakule suśīlaḥ sevyo narāṇām abhidarśanīyaḥ /
XXkathinau:359: prāsādiko dhīrasukhī suvarṇaḥ śrīmān asau śālinivedyadānāt // nivedya
XXkathinau:361: bhavati bhogaparāyaṇa īśvaro gaṇavarāya pradāya satakrakam // laḍḍukādi
XXkathinau:362: suvarṇarūpyādimaye gaṇāya ye dadhīndram ājyaṃ madhuśarkarāguḍam /
XXkathinau:363: nidhāya pātre pradadanti te narāḥ sudhāśinaḥ pañcavido balānvitāḥ // pañcasāra
XXkathinau:365: pañca kāmaguṇān bhuktvā tṛṣṇāṃ chindanti śāśvatīm // kumbha
XXkathinau:367: dhanadena samāno 'sau jāyate ca triratnake // kuṇḍikāpātra
XXkathinau:368: sarvaṃdadaś ca bhavati gṛhaṃ dattvā gaṇottame /
XXkathinau:369: sarvakāmasamṛddhas tu sarvatra sukham edhate // gṛha
XXkathinau:373: manojñavāṇīś ca surāsurāṇāṃ gandharvarājñā sadṛśas tu jāyate // ghaṇṭā
XXkathinau:374: yaḥ saṃghe pradadāti bhaiṣajavidhīṃs tāṃs tān prasannāśayaḥ sa vyādhyantarakalpasaṃbhavakṛtair duḥkhair na saṃspṛśayate /
XXkathinau:375: mukto vyādhijarādibhiś ca sukhito jīvaty abhinnāśayaḥ kleśavyādhivivarjito hi labhate cārogyam ātyantikam //
XXkathinau:377: tatra saṃghe nirābādhe ca bhaiṣajyam ayācata //
XXkathinau:379: ekāṃ harītakīṃ bhuktvā tat karma samudāgamat // 2
XXkathinau:380: pañca janmaśatāny asya na rogaḥ svalpako 'py abhūt /
XXkathinau:381: kleśavyādhiṃ vivarjitya nirvṛttiś carame bhave // 3 // bhaiṣajya
XXkathinau:382: svacchaṃ niṣpratigandhikaṃ laghutaraṃ svādānvitaṃ śītalaṃ yo niryātayatīha vītarajase saṃghāya hṛdyaṃ jalam /
XXkathinau:383: śuddhaiḥ kāyavacomanobhir asivat saṃtāpahīnaḥ sukhī tṛṣṇāṃ hanti na kevalaṃ vijahate saṃsāratṛṣṇāṃ api //
XXkathinau:387: na pipāsākṛtaṃ duḥkaṃ svapneṣv api anubhūtavān // 2 // jala
XXkathinau:388: ye saṃghe pratipādayanti muditās tṛṣṇācchidaṃ pānakaṃ hṛdyaṃ svādurasānvitaṃ paṭurasaṃ gandhābhirāmaṃ priyam /
XXkathinau:389: chittvā te bhavarāgasaṃbhavabhavāṃ tṛṣṇālatāṃ prajñayā pāraṃ yānti bhavārṇavasya niyataṃ dattvā śubhaṃ pānakam // pānaka
XXkathinau:390: aparimitadhanānāṃ vājināgair yutānāṃ subahuparijanānāṃ bhūbhujāṃ mandirāṇām /
XXkathinau:391: abhijalanidhibhūmiṃ prāpya rājā narāṇām paramarucirakāntir jāyate bhūpradānāt // bhūmi
XXkathinau:392: vicitradhānyādiphalādikaṃ ca śraddhānvito yaḥ pradāti samghe /
XXkathinau:393: iṣṭaṃ phalaṃ tasya phalanti nityaṃ sarvaṃ phalaṃ pacyati bodhimārge // vrīhi
XXkathinau:394: puṇyaṃ narāṇāṃ tamasi pradīpo bhayeṣu rakṣā vyasaneṣu bandhuḥ /
XXkathinau:395: rujāsu bhaiṣajyam anuttaraṃ ca plavaṃ ca saṃsāramahāsamudre //
XXkathinau:396: dānena bhogā na paropatāpāc chīlena svargo na giriprapātāt /
XXkathinau:397: satyena śaucyaṃ na jalapraveśāj jñānena mokṣo na śarīraśoṣāt //
XXkathinau:398: adattadānena daridrabhāvaṃ daridrabhāvāc ca karoti pāpam /
XXkathinau:399: pāpaṃ ca kṛtvā narakaṃ prayāti narakād vimuktaḥ punar eva pāpī //
XXkathinau:402: śuddhena manasā dravyaṃ svaṃ dadāti yadā pumān /
XXkathinau:404: lakṣmīr jājvalyamānā vasatu iha sadā kīrtir apy utsphurantī niḥśeṣāriḥ kṣitīśaḥ kṣitim avatu ciraṃ vyādhidurbhikṣamuktām /
XXkathinau:405: śīlāḍhyā dakṣiṇīyāḥ pravacananicaye vṛddhim āyāntu nityam ācandrārkaprakāśaṃ jayatu bhagavataḥ śāsanaṃ niṣprakampam //
XXkathinau:406: praśāstu dharmeṇa mahīṃ mahīpatir bhavantu ratnatrayapūjanā janāḥ /
XXkathinau:407: praśāntapāpāḥ pṛthugokulāḥ kulāḥ sadaiva nandantu ca suprajāḥ prajāḥ //
XXkathinau:408: vibhāti karabhāḥ suro nabhasi yāvad uṣṇaprabhaḥ prabhājaṭilamaṇḍalo hariṇalāñchanaś coditaḥ
XXkathinau:409: sphuranti kamalālayāḥ svbhuvi yāvad avyāhataṃ surāsuranamaskṛtaṃ sugataśāsanaṃ tiṣṭhatu //
XXkathinau:417: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api sāmagrīm prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehināṃ
XXkathinau:418: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asaṃkhyeye 'nyatamasmin karvaṭakaviṣaye gṛhapatiḥ prativasati sma /
XXkathinau:420: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXkathinau:421: tasya krīḍato ramataḥ paricārayataḥ patny āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā /
XXkathinau:422: kālāntareṇāṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt putro jātaḥ /
XXkathinau:424: athāpareṇa samayena tasya gṛhapateḥ patnī kālagatā /
XXkathinau:425: tenānyā patny ānītā tasya tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍato ramataḥ paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ /
XXkathinau:427: tasya krīḍato ramataḥ paricārayataḥ putraḥ prasūto duhitā ca jātā
XXkathinau:429: sa dārakaḥ tasyaiva bhrātuḥ sakāśe tiṣṭhati /
XXkathinau:438: āryaputra nāmāsyaikasya puruṣasya bhūtvopārdham asmākaṃ prabhūtānām upārdhaṃ bhaviṣyati /
XXkathinau:443: sa kathayati bhadre kathaṃ nāma svāpateyasyārthe bhrātaraṃ praghātayiṣyāmi /
XXkathinau:445: kāmān khalu sevamānasya nāsti kiñcit pāpakarmākaraṇīyam iti
XXkathinau:452: tena tatra parvatakuhare prakṣipya pāṣāṇena praghātita iti /
XXkathinau:457: aham eva tena kālena tena samayena /
XXkathinau:458: yat tan mayā vaimātriko bhrātā svāpateyakāraṇāt praghātitaḥ /
XXkathinau:459: tasya karmaṇo vipākena bahūni varṣakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi narakeṣūpapannaḥ /
XXkathinau:460: tenaiva karmāvaśeṣeṇaitarhi tathāgatasyābhisaṃbuddhasya pāṣāṇaśarkarayā pādaḥ kṣataḥ //
XXkathinau:461: 33 B kiṃ bhadanta bhagavatā karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena bhagavato
XXkathinau:464: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo dvau sārthavāhau nipuṇataḥ sāmudrayānapātraṃ pratipādya mahāsamudram avatīrṇau dhanahārakau
XXkathinau:471: sa tena sārthavāhena tulayā tulayitvā ratnāny apanīya sa sārthavāha ālāpitaḥ /
XXkathinau:473: ayaṃ saṃpannārtho yāsyati ahaṃ vipannārtha iti /
XXkathinau:476: uktaṃ ca sārthavāhena mā vahanaṃ chidraya /
XXkathinau:477: mā sarva evānayena vyasanam āpatsyāma iti /
XXkathinau:482: aham eva tena kālena tena samayena yat tan mayā śaktiprahāreṇa praghātitaḥ /
XXkathinau:483: tasya karmaṇo vipākena bahūni varṣaśatāni bahūni varṣakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi narakeṣūpapannaḥ
XXkathinau:484: tenaiva karmāvaśeṣeṇa tathāgatasyābhisaṃbuddhasya khadiraśalākayā vajrapādaḥ kṣataḥ //
XXkathinau:485: 34 B kiṃ bhadanta bhagavatā karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena sundarikāyā mānavikāyā abhūtenābhyākhyātaḥ
XXkathinau:486: tathāgatenaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitānīti vistaraḥ /
XXkathinau:489: aśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ vipaśyī nāma śāstā loka udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhagavān /
XXkathinau:490: vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravacanena dvau bhrātarau pravrajitau babhūvatur vasiṣṭho bharadvājas ca /
XXkathinau:492: bharadvājenāpi paṭhatā svādhyāyatā trīṇi piṭakāny adhītāni /
XXkathinau:497: tena tasya bhrātuḥ samvṛttam āgaccaikadhye vāsaṃ kalpayāmaḥ /
XXkathinau:498: sa tatra gataḥ tena gṛhapatinā dṛṣṭaḥ /
XXkathinau:499: arhad bhikṣuḥ kāyaprāsādikaś cittaprāsādikaś ca dṛṣṭvābhiprasannaḥ /
XXkathinau:500: sa tena prasādajātena pūjayitvā mahārheṇa ca vastreṇācchāditaḥ /
XXkathinau:503: sa vastreṇa chādayaty eṣa chādita iti tasyāntike
XXkathinau:505: sa tena dṛṣṭaḥ paryavasthitaḥ sa saṃlakṣayati yady aham asya dāsyāmi /
XXkathinau:506: bhūyasyā mātrayā prasādaṃ praveśayiṣyatīti kṛtvā sa tasyaivātisṛṣṭaḥ /
XXkathinau:508: tasya gṛhapateḥ preṣyadārikā tasmin vihāra āgatya parikarma karoti /
XXkathinau:515: tvaṃ ca tad vastrayugaṃ prāvṛtya gṛhaparikarma kuru /
XXkathinau:516: yadi gṛhapatiḥ pṛcchet kutas tavaitad vastrayugam iti vaktavyam amukenāryeṇa mama dattam iti
XXkathinau:518: vaktavyam āryeṇaitad api praṣṭavyaṃ kimartham puruṣāḥ strīṇām anuprayacchantīti /
XXkathinau:519: sā taṃ vastraṃ prāvṛtya gṛhaparikarma kartum ārabdhā /
XXkathinau:534: bharadvājo nāma yena tad arhann abhūtenābhyākhātaḥ /
XXkathinau:535: aham eva tena kālena tena samayena yat sa mayārhad bhikṣur abhūtenābhyākhyātaḥ /
XXkathinau:536: tasya karmaṇo vipākena bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi bahūni varṣakoṭīśatāni narakeṣūpapannaḥ
XXkathinau:537: / yāvat tenaiva karmāvaśeṣeṇaitarhi tathāgataḥ sundarikāyā mānavikāyā
